column5: 2015 at vanderbilt medical center. funeral services will be conducted monday june 15th at 1:00 p. m. in the oakhurst chapel of the robertson county funeral home. interment will follow in the elmwood cemetery. the family will receive friends on monday from 10:00 a. m. until service time at the funeral home. stacey was born august 25
column6: 1974 in robertson county. she was a homemaker and of the baptist faith. stacey was always active and loved her family very much. she was preceded in death by her father: ricky burns
column7: and by her sons: billy randall rose and keith ashley johnson
column8: jr. stacey is survived by her sons: jonathan rose of columbus

column11: mother and step-father: sherry and joe green of springfield
column12: fianc: chris brown of millersville. the family request memorial contributions be made to the stacey maynard funeral fund. upcoming events. visitationjun 15. 10:00 am - 1:00 pm robertson county funeral home2201 memorial blvd. springfield
